1.title: Co-operation in Charleston
1.plot: In South Carolina, the green roof revolution; a locally focused coop incubates farm and food enterprise; an innovative bridge helps protect the marshland ecosystem.

2.title: Pipe Dreams - Gray to Green
2.plot: In Atlanta, GA and Portland, OR, replacing traditional pipework processing with "green" infrastructure, along with new legislation, has transformed storm water management with stunning environmental and community benefits.

3.title: Reclaiming and Rebuilding
3.plot: In Oregon, two non-profits build community from a culture of second chances - one with mentor programs to turn lives around after hardship, another that salvages building materials sold to profit the community.

4.title: Programming a Smarter City
4.plot: In Kansas City, a revolution of integrated technology is going to enhance livability with responsive, real-time solutions to transportation, communication and more issues across cities and workplaces.

5.title: Not Business as Usual
5.plot: In Atlanta, a manufacturing company becomes an advocate for the earth, changing their process without losing profits and making community education part of their mission.

6.title: Cultivating a Community
6.plot: In Austin, TX, Barton Springs' successful balance of public playground and federally protected habitat, and programs geared to families and children promote healthy lifestyles, offer sustainability of the human experience.

imdb.plot outline: VISIONKEEPERS(TM) is a public television lifestyle/travel series and podcast which explores how individuals and organizations across the United States and internationally are improving their communities through innovations focused on sustainability in its varied forms. For inspiration, these "VisionKeepers" look to past generations who did not waste resources out of necessity. Today, using modern ingenuity to move away from a disposable mindset to benefit current and future generations. The series premiered in April 2018 on public television stations (check local listings). A companion podcast launched in April 2018 to explore additional stories of sustainability beyond the television broadcast. The VisionKeepers(TM) series is created and hosted by Dan Bärham, an American entrepreneur, who dedicated himself to promoting conservation and sustainability after an assignment in Europe changed his perspective.
